A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class topquiz.InteractiveQuestionPanel
Detects all action performed and if it detects the submit button was clicked, will then check the current selected answer against the correct answer and either reward points if its correct, will then call nextQuestion() to display the next question.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class topquiz.MultipleChoiceQuestionPanel
Detects all action performed and stores that action performed into src.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class topquiz.QuestionPanel
Method defenition required by interface for ActionListener, is overriden by the subclasses of QuestionPanel.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class topquiz.ShortAnswerQuestionPanel
Detects an action performed, will then take the text from the textfield and enter it as the user's response.
addNewQuestion(Question) - Method in class topquizbackend.QuestionBank
Method for adding Questions to the QuestionBank's ArrayList of questions; bank.
addPoints(int) - Method in class topquizbackend.QuestionBank
This method is used to add points to the user's curretnScore.
